Gold SQL: SELECT T1.name, COUNT(T2.friend_id) FROM Highschooler AS T1 JOIN Friend AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.student_id WHERE T1.name != T2.friend_id GROUP BY T1.name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.friend_id) DESC
Predicted NLQ:
```
· Person 1: John has 41 friends.
· Person 2: Karthik has 40 friends.
· Person 3: David has 38 friends.
```

Back translation NLQ: What is the name of each high schooler and how many friends do they have excluding themselves, listed in descending order?
